page.title: 04Wildlife in Pendock.
page.content: There are lots of wild creatures in Pendock.We have lots of birds like Bluetits,Robins,Crows and Blackbirds.I get a lot of Chaffinches and Yellowhammers.In Winter we feed the birds.Adrian has got a lot hedgehogs in his garden.Every night he puts milk out for them. At Gadbury Bank there is a lot of wildlife like moles,squirrels and foxes,they also have lots of birds like pigeons and owls.In the fields next door there is a pond where are gulls,muteswans, moorhens and coots.Our cat also catches plenty of rabbits and voles. Pendock school is a very good place to see wildlife (mainly birds) because it is so quiet.We get lots of animals in the school groud despite the M.50 being so close.
